mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, memberMobile) values(#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberMobile})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberEmail=#{memberEmail} and memberPassword=#{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update member_table set memberPassword=#{memberPassword}, memberName=#{memberName}, memberMobile=#{memberMobile} where id=#{id}
